A.definition: A red or green fruit that grows on trees?
hints: Often baked in pies or pressed into juice.
Grows in orchards and has a little stem on top.
Keeps well in a lunchbox and can be sliced.
Five letters, starts with A and ends with E.

B.definition: What do you read that has pages and words?
hints: Lives on shelves and in libraries.
You turn pages to keep going.

C.definition: A small furry pet that says 'meow'?
hints: Purrs when happy and naps a lot.
Often chases yarn or laser dots.
Has whiskers and sharp little claws.

D.definition: A loyal pet that barks and wags its tail?
hints: Enjoys walks with a leash and collar.
Known as a best friend to humans.
Loves to fetch a ball or stick.

E.definition: A large gray animal with a long trunk?
hints: Has tusks and big flapping ears.
Famous for great memory and size.
Uses its trunk to drink and lift things.

F.definition: An animal that lives in water and has fins?
hints: Can swim alone or in schools.
Lives in tanks, rivers, and seas.

G.definition: A musical instrument with strings that you strum?
hints: Played with fingers or a pick.
Comes in acoustic and electric versions.
Has rooms, windows, and a roof.
You sleep here and keep your things.
May have a yard or garden.

I.definition: Frozen water that is cold and hard?

J.definition: What do you do when you leap off the ground?
hints: Used in many sports and games.
Up you go, then back down.

K.definition: What opens a lock or door?
hints: Fits into a cylinder to turn.

L.definition: The king of the jungle with a big mane?
hints: A large kind of cat that roars.

M.definition: What shines in the sky at night?
hints: Has phases like full and crescent.

N.definition: The part of your face you use to smell?
hints: Helps you breathe as well as smell.

O.definition: A large body of salt water?
hints: Home to whales and coral reefs.

P.definition: A round food with cheese and toppings?
hints: Made of dough, sauce, and cheese.

Q.definition: A female ruler of a country?
hints: Appears on playing cards and in chess.

R.definition: Water that falls from clouds in the sky?
hints: You might hear it on the roof.

S.definition: The bright star that gives us light and heat?
hints: Rises in the east and sets in the west.
Warms the Earth and makes daylight.

T.definition: A tall plant with branches and leaves?
hints: Rings inside can show its age.
Keeps you dry on wet days.

V.definition: A musical instrument you play with a bow?
hints: Played with a wooden bow and rosin.

W.definition: A clear liquid that you drink?
hints: Freezes into ice at 0 degrees Celsius.
Found in rivers, lakes, and taps.

X.definition: A medical picture that shows your bones?
hints: Lets doctors see through skin to bones.
Spelling may include a hyphen or space.

Y.definition: The color of the sun and bananas?
hints: Appears in traffic lights between red and green.

Z.definition: A place where you can see wild animals?
hints: You buy a ticket and get a map.
